tool.name: Compute score and metrics with Episcanpy

configfiles.configfile:
@CMD_imports@ import scanpy as sc import episcanpy as esc @CMD_read_inputs@ #if $method.method == 'tl.ARI' esc.tl.ARI( adata, label_1='$method.ARI_label_1', label_2='$method.ARI_label_2' )
#else if $method.method == 'tl.homogeneity' esc.tl.ARI( adata, label_1='$method.homogeneity_label_1', label_2='$method.homogeneity_label_2' )
#else if $method.method == 'tl.AMI' esc.tl.ARI( adata, label_1='$method.AMI_label_1', label_2='$method.AMI_label_2' )
#else if $method.method == 'tl.rank_features' esc.tl.rank_features( adata, groupby='$method.rank_features_groupby', use_raw=$method.rank_features_use_raw, groups='$method.rank_features_groups', reference='$method.rank_features_reference', n_features=$method.rank_features_n_features, rankby_abs=$method.rank_features_rankby_abs, key_added='$method.rank_features_key_added', copy=False, method='$method.rank_features_method', corr_method='$method.rank_features_corr_method' )
#end if adata.write('anndata.h5ad')

param.label: Method used to compute score/metrics
param.option: ARI: Compute Adjusted Rand Index (ARI), using 'tl.ARI'
AMI: Compute Adjusted Mutual Information (AMI), using 'tl.AMI'
Rank features for characterizing groups, using 'tl.rank_features'

param.name: ARI_label_1
param.label: Label 1
param.help: (label_1, Computes a similarity measure between label_1 and label_2)

param.name: rank_features_groupby
param.label: The key of the observations grouping to consider

param.name: rank_features_use_raw
param.label: Use raw attribute of Anndata if present

param.name: rank_features_groups
param.label: Subset of groups, to which comparison shall be restricted

param.name: rank_features_reference
param.label: Compare each group with respect to this group

param.name: rank_features_n_features
param.label: The number of features that appear in the returned tables

param.name: rank_features_rankby_abs
param.label: Rank genes by the absolute value of the score, not by the score

param.name: rank_features_key_added
param.label: The key in adata.uns information is saved to

param.name: rank_features_method
param.label: Method to use
param.option: None: Do not use any method

tool.help:
Automatically compute PCA coordinates (`pp.lazy`) ======================================================================================== This function automatically computes PCA coordinates, loadings and variance decomposition, a neighborhood graph of observations, t-distributed stochastic neighborhood embedding (tSNE) Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection (UMAP).
More details on the `episcanpy documentation <https://colomemaria.github.io/episcanpy_doc/api/episcanpy.api.pp.lazy.html>`__
